mapper.select: SELECT s.somoim_number, s.somoim_location, s.somoim_name, s.somoim_sys_mainpicture, sm.member_date, sm.member_grade FROM somoim s, somoim_member sm where s.somoim_number = sm.somoim_number and sm.member_status = 1 and sm.member_name = #{name}

select m.member_profile_picture, m.member_profile_contents, m.member_name, sm.member_grade from SOMOIM_MEMBER sm, Member m where sm.MEMBER_NAME = m.MEMBER_ID and sm.somoim_number = #{roomnum} and sm.member_status = 1

select jr.*, nvl2(jm.member_number,1,0) as my_attend_check from JUNGMO_ROOM jr, (select * from JUNGMO_MEMBER where member_id = #{id}) jm where jr.jungmo_number = jm.jungmo_number(+) and jr.somoim_number=#{somoim_number} and jr.jungmo_date > sysdate order by jungmo_date

select jr.somoim_number, jr.jungmo_number, jr.jungmo_date ,jm.member_id as jungmo_join_id from JUNGMO_ROOM jr, jungmo_member jm where jr.jungmo_number = jm.jungmo_number and jr.SOMOIM_NUMBER = #{somoim_number} and jm.member_id =#{id} and jr.jungmo_date > sysdate order by jungmo_date
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jungmo_member WHERE jungmo_number = #{jungmo_number} and somoim_number = #{somoim_number} and MEMBER_ID = #{jungmo_join_id}
mapper.select: select m.member_name, m.member_profile_picture, m.member_profile_contents, sm.member_grade, jm.somoim_number from JUNGMO_MEMBER jm, MEMBER m, SOMOIM_MEMBER sm where jm.member_id = m.member_id and jm.member_id=sm.member_name and jm.somoim_number=sm.somoim_number and jungmo_number = #{jungmoNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM somoim_member WHERE SOMOIM_NUMBER = #{somoimnum} and MEMBER_NAME =#{name}
mapper.select: select rc.total_reple, lc.total_like ,m.member_profile_picture, sb.board_content,sb.board_first_pic, sb.board_first_syspic, sb.board_fix, sb.board_number, sb.board_second_pic , sb.board_second_syspic, sb.board_third_pic, sb.board_third_syspic, sb.board_title , sb.board_type, sb.board_write_date, sb.board_write_update, sb.board_writer, sb.somoim_number from SOMOIM_BOARD sb, MEMBER m, (select BOARD_NUMBER, count(*) as total_reple from SOMOIM_BOARD_REPLE GROUP by BOARD_NUMBER) rc, (select BOARD_NUMBER, count(*) as total_like from SOMOIM_BOARD_LIKE GROUP by BOARD_NUMBER) lc where sb.board_writer = m.member_id and sb.board_NUMBER = rc.board_number(+) and sb.board_number = lc.board_number(+) and SOMOIM_NUMBER = #{somoimnum} and BOARD_FIX = '고정' order by BOARD_WRITE_DATE desc

select rc.total_reple, lc.total_like ,m.member_profile_picture, sb.board_content,sb.board_first_pic, sb.board_first_syspic, sb.board_fix, sb.board_number, sb.board_second_pic , sb.board_second_syspic, sb.board_third_pic, sb.board_third_syspic, sb.board_title , sb.board_type, sb.board_write_date, sb.board_write_update, sb.board_writer, sb.somoim_number from SOMOIM_BOARD sb, MEMBER m, (select BOARD_NUMBER, count(*) as total_reple from SOMOIM_BOARD_REPLE GROUP by BOARD_NUMBER) rc, (select BOARD_NUMBER, count(*) as total_like from SOMOIM_BOARD_LIKE GROUP by BOARD_NUMBER) lc where sb.board_writer = m.member_id and sb.board_NUMBER = rc.board_number(+) and sb.board_number = lc.board_number(+) and SOMOIM_NUMBER = #{somoimnum} and BOARD_FIX = '비고정' order by BOARD_WRITE_DATE desc

select m.member_profile_picture, sb.board_content,sb.board_first_pic, sb.board_first_syspic, sb.board_fix, sb.board_number, sb.board_second_pic , sb.board_second_syspic, sb.board_third_pic, sb.board_third_syspic, sb.board_title , sb.board_type, sb.board_write_date, sb.board_write_update, sb.board_writer, sb.somoim_number from SOMOIM_BOARD sb, MEMBER m where sb.board_writer = m.member_id and BOARD_NUMBER = #{board_number}
select count(*) as board_like from SOMOIM_BOARD_LIKE where BOARD_NUMBER = #{board_number} and LIKE_NAME = #{name}
select count(*) as total_like from SOMOIM_BOARD_LIKE where BOARD_NUMBER = #{board_number}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SOMOIM_BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{board_number} and LIKE_NAME = #{board_like_name}

sbr.somoim_board_reple_update, sbr.somoim_number from Member m, SOMOIM_BOARD_REPLE sbr where m.member_id = sbr.somoim_board_reple_name and sbr.board_number =#{board_number} order by somoim_board_reple_number desc) where rownum <=5
